    @pytest.mark.parametrize(
        'platform, url',
        [
            ('cnblogs', 'https://www.cnblogs.com/testlearn/p/15693366.html'),

            ('dingxiangyishegn_mobile', 'https://m.dxy.com/article/50056'),
            ('dingxiangyishegn_web', 'https://dxy.com/article/50056'),
            ('zhihu_zhuanlan', 'https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/711679452')
        ])
    def test_web2douyin(test_output_dir, platform, url):
        """
        测试网页内容发不到 douyin
        """
        # 在测试开始前， conftest.py 已经把 config 文件夹拷贝进来了
        source_config_dir = os.path.join(curr_dir, 'config')
        work_path = test_output_dir
    
        _ = platform
    
        with FileUtil.copy_file_context([source_config_dir], work_path):
            config_path = os.path.join(work_path, 'config', 'config.ini')
            set_config(config_path=config_path,
                       settings={
                           ('publish', 'media_type'): Const.MEDIA_TYPE_IMG_ARTICLE,
                           ('publish', 'publish_account'): Account.TEST
                       })
>           main(url=url, work_path=work_path)
